alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ellis County through 745 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waxahachie, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Oak Leaf and Maypearl. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 388 and 406. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
